body.name: Ultra Pain Relief Cooling Pillow for Neck Support, Adjustable Cervical Pillow Cozy Sleeping, Odorless Ergonomic Contour Memory Foam Pillows, Orthopedic Bed Pillow for Side Back Stomach Sleeper
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 44 mins
features: REVOLUTIONIZE YOUR SLEEP WITH THE INNOVATIVE HOLLOW CONCAVE DESIGN - Tired of waking up with neck pain and discomfort? Look no further! By combining the benefits of a traditional bed pillow and a contour pillow, Our ergonomic hollow contour pillow is here to transform your sleep experience. The hollow concave surface, tilted at a 15-degree angle, skillfully cradles your head, while maintaining the natural curve of your neck and aligning your spine flawlessly. Wake up feeling refreshed!

EXPERIENCE UNINTERRUPTED, BLISSFUL SLEEP WITH OUR VERSATILE PILLOW - Engineered with meticulous precision, this innovative neck pillow features six unique contour zones specifically designed to embrace the natural curvature of your body. Each contour zone works harmoniously to address targeted pressure points, it provides full support to your neck, shoulders, and arms, effectively alleviating your neck pain and muscle stiffness. No longer will you have to compromise on the quality of your rest.

EMBRACE HEALTHY SLEEP WITH PREMIUM MEMORY FOAM & COOLING PILLOWCASE - Unlike 90% of support pillows, Cozyplayer utilizes the Q-Max 0.4 Arc-Chill cooling pillowcase, which instantly reduces skin temperature by 5℃! Additionally, the pillowcase fabric utilizes a highly dense 3D mesh design, offering excellent breathability. Our pillow core is made of 98% breathable memory foam, which is non-toxic, odorless, and certified by OEKO-TEX, CertiPUR-US, and ISPA. Sleep soundly and stay dry all night!

CUSTOMIZABLE SLEEP HEIGHT! EXPERIENCE TRUE LIBERATION! According to the latest research, maintaining a 15° golden ratio of ARC neck traction during sleep is pivotal in restoring the body's natural curves and enhancing deep sleep by an astounding 45 minutes! Cozyplayer offers enhanced freedom in this regard, allowing you to achieve greater contouring by rotating the cooling pillow 180 degrees or removing the bottom insert. You'll always find the perfect sleep height on our bed pillow!

NO-WORRY AFTER-SALE SUPPORT, YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED! - we are dedicated to delivering top-notch products that enhance your shopping journey. To exemplify our commitment, we proudly offer you a risk-free 100-night trial period for this remarkable contour pillow. Moreover, it doubles as an excellent gift for your parents, friends, long-term usage will greatly improve the quality of sleep. Note: The actual experience of pillows may vary from person to person, contact us if any issues arise!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How can l adjust Cozyplayer pillow to obtain a comfortable height? The pillow offers two adjustable heights. It comes with a removable 0.8" thick insert at the bottom, allowing you to lower the pillow's height. If you require additional height, simply let us know, and we can provide an extra insert. How to properly use this pillow? While your body adapts to the correct position, you might experience initial discomfort in the first two weeks. Embrace this adjustment period to truly witness the results. Can I buy this without any concerns? With Cozyplayer's strong product confidence, we offer a 100-night trial and 10-year support to assist you effectively. We're here to lend a hand! What should I do if the product I purchase does not meet my expectations? Please feel free to contact cozyplayer after-sales email, and we will do our utmost to assist you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dream Come True for Neck Comfort!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Ultra Pain Relief Cooling Pillow, and it has truly transformed my sleep experience. Here's why I'm giving it a well-deserved 5 stars:Pain Relief Magic: As someone who often experiences neck pain, this pillow has been a game-changer. The adjustable cervical support is just what my neck needed. I wake up feeling refreshed and without any discomfort.Cooling Bliss: The cooling feature is not just a gimmick; it's a lifesaver! The pillow stays refreshingly cool throughout the night, providing a soothing sensation that enhances my overall sleep quality.Odorless Wonder: One common issue with memory foam pillows is the initial chemical smell. However, I was pleasantly surprised that this pillow is completely odorless. No need to endure any unpleasant scents while trying to catch some Zs.Ergonomic Design: The ergonomic contour of this pillow is designed with precision. It perfectly accommodates my sleeping position, whether I'm on my side, back, or stomach. It's like having a customized pillow made just for me.Versatile Sleeper's Delight: This pillow caters to all types of sleepers. No matter your preferred sleeping position, you can count on this orthopedic bed pillow to provide the support and comfort you need for a restful night's sleep.In conclusion, the Ultra Pain Relief Cooling Pillow is more than just a pillow; it's a sleep revolution. If you're in the market for a pillow that cares for your neck, provides a cool and comfortable sleeping experience, and boasts an ergonomic design, look no further. This pillow is a must-have for anyone seeking the ultimate sleep upgrade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Believe the hype
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is incredible, simply incredible. I have difficulty staying asleep for long periods and since getting this pillow I am sleeping for much longer and more comfortably. My neck and shoulder pain is improving, but I've only had it for a few weeks and Rome wasn't built in a day. I do recommend requesting the insert if you're a side sleeper, especially if you have broadish shoulders. Just make sure you email the address on the product description images, not through Amazon. They're very quick to respond and ship.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My sleep quality improved overnight with this neck supporting pillow! Your head fits into the middle of the pillow which has a cooling soft cushion that truly reduces the stress on the neck and spine. There are spaces on the sides allowing room or your arms if you are a side or stomach sleeper so your shoulders don't feel strain. There is no more tossing and turning to adjust your old pillow during the night, this soft comfortable cooling pillow keeps its shape to to enable a great nights sleep. My sleep tracker proves I'm getting a better nights sleep. Great quality for the cost, I'm impressed with this pillow overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cervical Pillow That Transformed My Sleep
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this cervical pillow on a friend's recommendation, and it has completely transformed my sleep experience. The memory foam construction provides excellent support to the neck and shoulders, promoting a natural and comfortable alignment throughout the night.It cradles the neck gently, easing tension and allowing for a more restful sleep. What I appreciate most is the adaptability of the pillow – it's not too firm, not too soft, but just right for a personalized sleep haven.The breathable cover adds an extra layer of comfort, and the overall quality is top-notch. I've noticed a significant improvement in my sleep quality and wake up feeling refreshed.This purchase has been a game-changer for my sleep routine, and I couldn't be happier with the results.P.S. if the pillow is too low, you could request an additional padding at no extra cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good pillow but not a queen
reviews.reviewText: It does sleep well. I slept through the night and felt better in the morning. The only thing so far is it isn’t a queen size pillow. It’s barely standard size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillow for neck support
reviews.reviewText: I’ve definitely been using regular pillows all my life, yet neck support was becoming a big issue for me since I was sleeping on my side regularly. Now that I’ve been using this pillow for several months now, I can honestly say it was worth every penny and some. This pillow has definitely offered me great support for my neck and nice refreshing/comfortable feeling that last throughout the night. This is really a pillow you’ll love if getting the best night sleep is as important for you as it is for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: I had a bad injury over a year ago that left me with a bulging disc on my neck and wounded my head. The way my head and body are positioned at night determine the quality of the next day and I really needed a solution bc a few months ago, I suffered a shoulder strain while working out and it really setback the condition of my neck and back. I bought this pillow bc of its design to aid my neck and shoulders since I have to sleep on my side and it had an edge over other pillows because of its cooling feature—which I do appreciate. However, I cannot recommend this pillow because it alone has not solved my sleeping problem. If my head isn’t exactly parallel throughout the night, I have headaches and sharp neck pain all day the next day. And idk if my shoulders are broader than most but it’s not thick enough to position my head the way it needs. It sounds silly but I have to stack clothes under the pillow to make sure it’s the right level and for that reason the product doesn’t deserve 5 stars. Will look into another side sleeper pillow with the adequate level unless this company has a different version/product that can help. And btw, if you have a small frame, this pillow could work for you. If you have a larger shoulder frame like myself, I wouldn’t recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: I was ready for disappointment but it works!
reviews.reviewText: I was waking up with a painful neck and couldn't turn my head for the first few hours of the day for a few days so I decided to try this after browsing pillows on Amazon for neck pain.To be honest I did not expect it to work as well as it did since I never even heard of the Cozyplayer brand, but after just one night of use I woke up the next morning with no pain at all. Its been around two months now and the pillow is holding its shape even when I fold it in half to watch TV lol. I've tried a similar shaped pillow to this one and it did not help at all, this one is just the perfect height for me but maybe YMMV.Thank you Cozyplayer! I will be recommending this pillow to friends and family as well.

This pillow is great for the first few weeks. There is a hole in the centre of the pillow that is meant to work as a spot for your head to settle and also to give the pillow a curved shape but in the bottom of that hole there is a hard plastic fastener that goes through both sides of the pillow to help keep that hole pulled in. The problem is that over time the hole’s sides get weaker and so your head goes into the hole more and the plastic hurts your ear… like for the whole next day. When I initially reached out to this company about the pillow needing the advertised extra bit of foam to make it fuller, they said they didn’t have any and they gave me a partial refund. I’d probably give the pillow 2 stars if not for the good customer service. That said, I’ve just ordered a different cervical pillow from a different company that doesn’t have a hole or a plastic bit in it.
